v8:item.v8:content: ATTENTION! After changing the number automatic numbering for this document will be disabled! Enable number editing?
UWAGA! Po zmianie numeru numeracja automatyczna tego dokumentu zostanie wyłączona! Włączyć moźliwość zmiany numeru?
ВНИМАНИЕ! После изменения номера автоматическая нумерация документов будет отключена! Разрешить редактирование номера документа?
ATTENTION! After changing the number automatic numbering for this document will be disabled! Enable number editing?
UWAGA! Po zmianie numeru numeracja automatyczna tego dokumentu zostanie wyłączona! Włączyć moźliwość zmiany numeru?
ВНИМАНИЕ! После изменения номера автоматическая нумерация документов будет отключена! Разрешить редактирование номера документа?
Offsetting of debts in different currency
Difference between amount of settl. doc's and amount to settl.
Różnica między kwotą rozlicz. dok. a kwotą do rozliczenia
Разница между суммой взаиморасчета и суммой перед взаиморасчетом
Kwota do rozliczenia bez uwzględnienia zaliczek

Settings.QueryText:
SELECT PartnersSettlementsBalance.Employee AS Partner, PartnersSettlementsBalance.Document, PartnersSettlementsBalance.Currency, PartnersSettlementsBalance.ReservationDocument, VALUETYPE(PartnersSettlementsBalance.Document) AS DocumentType, VALUETYPE(PartnersSettlementsBalance.ReservationDocument) AS ReservationDocumentType, SUM(-PartnersSettlementsBalance.AmountBalance) AS Amount, PartnersSettlementsBalance.SettlementType, SUM(-PartnersSettlementsBalance.AmountNationalBalance) AS AmountNationalBalance, PartnersSettlementsBalance.Document.InitialDocumentNumber FROM AccumulationRegister.EmployeesSettlements.Balance(, Employee = &Partner) AS PartnersSettlementsBalance
GROUP BY PartnersSettlementsBalance.ReservationDocument, PartnersSettlementsBalance.Employee, PartnersSettlementsBalance.Document, PartnersSettlementsBalance.Currency, VALUETYPE(PartnersSettlementsBalance.ReservationDocument), VALUETYPE(PartnersSettlementsBalance.Document), PartnersSettlementsBalance.SettlementType
